Comment: TLDR: not too bad yet but things are slowing down and traffic will be dropping 25% a week. Not a ghost town yet. There was actually a bit of a pickup as people ordered ahead.

Comment: Exactly what intelligent and sane people thought would happen: shipments are dropping. There was an initial surge as companies tried to get cargo in before tariffs hit, but the projected shipments are dropping hard.  This is 97% Trump’s fault, 2% Republicans in government fault, and 1% the fault of those that elected these idiots.
